ygData.messageBody:
> It would be a bitch to get bound, but it would be possible.
>

exactly, way too much of a pain and way too complex. there are and must be
penalties to dying: loss of experience and returning to bind point. a
couple months into final release, there was a decision made to reduce
drastically the amount of experience loss when dying, but keeping the
binding policy in place. i would vote for this any day of the week, and i
assume it was this or change the binding policy and keep the experience loss
the same. above level 30 every death was approximately TWO BUBBLES of
experience. i lose about 25% of that now, and trust me that has saved me a
hell of a lot more time just running back to my group instead of having to
rebuild that experience. anyway, i can not foresee changing my view on
binding. and my two highest level characters can not bind. the only
trouble i ever had getting bound was in the first week when no one could
(hehe my friend was the first person on our server to reach level 12 who
could bind which was cool). it is a pain to die, as it should be. no one
likes it. the ability to bind is reserved by a few classes, and it is part
of the choice on what class you want to play.

Shada D'ukal, Level 50 Wood Elf Bard
Erisi Dlarit, Level 24 High Elf Paladin
Tyria Sarkin, Level 22 High Elf Wizard
Mithaniel Marr Server
